title: T205 Cy Young (SC Black 25 back) + 2 other T205s (Adkins and Sharpe) - SOLD
author: canjond

posts.post_title: T205 Cy Young (SC Black 25 back) + 2 other T205s (Adkins and Sharpe) - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Nice collector grade!  An SGC 1.5 on ebay just went for about $350.  This one priced at $105 shipped and insured...

[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/youngfront.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/youngback.jpg[/IMG]

I'm adding two additional T205s into the mix...  Adkins (Hassan) and Sharpe (SC).

[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/T205fronts.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/T205backs.jpg[/IMG]
